message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm looking to spend closer to $105.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to spend closer to $105, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $107.50. What do you think?
